short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is a personal Browser Dashboard with the functionality of current weather, time, favourite links and crypto price tracker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is a Personal Dashboard for browser, where user can see time and the current weather. there is also a functionality where user can save the favorite links as cards for easy access. And a crypto price tracker.
